title: Crip Camp: A Disability Revolution
description:
Tig and Cheryl talk Crip Camp, a Barack and Michelle Obama-produced doc about a hippy summer camp for the disabled that becomes a springboard for decades of civil rights activism. Amidst talk of crabs and slobby boyfriends, there are also some poignant moments... could this be the rare doc to make BOTH hosts cry? We won't spill the beans-- you'll just have to listen and find out. *this episode contains spoilers* (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
